description: Text sections, about pages, and content blocks

components.name: FAQ Accordion
components.description: Clean FAQ section with accordion-style questions and answers
components.styleNotes: Minimal design with smooth accordion animations, theme-aware.

components.name: Case Study Showcase
components.description: Professional case study layout with featured case and additional studies grid
components.styleNotes: Clean grid layout with hover effects, dotted pattern backgrounds, professional typography with theme integration.

components.name: Achievements & Recognition List
components.description: Structured list showcasing awards, achievements, and recognition with icons and categories
components.styleNotes: Clean list layout with icons, category labels, achievement titles, and action links - fully responsive.

components.name: Comprehensive About Section

components.name: Aceternity Timeline
components.description: Advanced timeline component with sticky header and scroll beam follow - perfect for showcasing company history, project milestones, and chronological content
